p: POME; in addition include large amounts of solids, both suspended solids and total dissolved solids in the range of 18,000 mg/L and 40,500 mg/L correspondingly. These solids are usually named palm oil mill sludges (POMS). The solid waste that are formed in the process of extraction are the leaves, trunk, decanter cake, empty fruit bunches, seed shells and fibre from the mesocarp ( Rupani et al. 2010 ).
